ai.summary: Castle Ward - Farm Trail is a gentle 4.5 km hike in the UK countryside. The route follows farm tracks and grassy paths, suitable for beginners and families seeking a relaxing outdoor stroll with light scenery.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly well-marked gravel and compacted dirt tracks across farmland. Expect short sections of grassy fields and possible muddy patches after rain. Some gates and occasional stiles; flat to rolling terrain with minimal elevation gain.
ai.safety_notes: Bring water and weather-appropriate clothing. Wear sturdy footwear. Check the forecast and daylight hours. Stay on official paths, close gates behind you, and watch for livestock. Mobile signal may be limited in rural areas; carry a map or offline navigation and inform someone of your plan.
recommended_gear: Map or offline navigation on a phone
ai.best_seasons: Spring, Summer and Autumn; mild weather makes for a pleasant hike, with winter conditions often more muddy and less comfortable.

seo.title: Castle Ward - Farm Trail: Easy 4.5 km Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Discover Castle Ward - Farm Trail, a 4.5 km easy hike in the UK countryside. Gentle farm tracks, family-friendly terrain, safety tips, and gear recommendations.
